faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Our support team is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST.
faq.q2: How quickly will I get a response?
faq.a2: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours.
faq.a3: Yes, phone support is available for premium members during business hours.

hero.title: About DayTradeDak
hero.subtitle: Transforming lives through professional trading education and mentorship

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To democratize trading education and empower individuals worldwide to achieve financial independence through smart, disciplined trading strategies and comprehensive mentorship.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading platform for trading education, creating a global community of successful, ethical traders who contribute to financial markets with knowledge, discipline, and integrity.

ceo.title: Meet Our Founder
ceo.bio1: Mijail Medina is a profitable trader born in Cienfuegos, Cuba. He studied mechanical engineering and from a young age had a strong motivation to achieve financial freedom, seeing investments as the path to achieve it.
ceo.bio2: After leaving Cuba, he lived experiences that marked him, such as meeting someone in Spain who made investments but did not allow him to learn directly from him. Despite these limitations, Mijail knew how to extract valuable lessons and found his own path to become a successful trader.
ceo.bio3: Today, he specializes in interactive live sessions, offering personalized and practical guidance so that others can achieve their goals in the world of trading. In addition, he has decided to share his experience through a book that narrates his journey from his beginnings to reaching his first million, and is developing a course to teach others to be profitable traders.
ceo.bio4: His story focuses on how to overcome adversity and how to transform into the person necessary to achieve financial success.

transformation.title: Personal Transformation
transformation.description: We believe success in trading starts with personal growth and mindset development.

education.title: Quality Education
education.description: Comprehensive, practical education that prepares you for real market conditions.

community.title: Strong Community
community.description: A supportive network of traders sharing knowledge and experiences.

success.title: Proven Success
success.description: Strategies and methods tested in real markets with consistent results.

journey.title: The Journey to Success
journey.content1: From humble beginnings in Cuba to achieving financial freedom through trading, Mijail's journey is a testament to perseverance, continuous learning, and the power of transformation.
journey.content2: His approach combines technical analysis with psychological discipline, creating a comprehensive methodology that has helped thousands of students achieve their trading goals.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Trading Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join our community and learn from a proven successful trader

sizeGuide.title: Size Guide
sizeGuide.subtitle: Find your perfect fit with our comprehensive sizing chart

chest.title: Chest Width
chest.description: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape measure horizontal.

length.title: Body Length
length.description: Measure from the highest point of the shoulder down to the bottom hem.

sleeve.title: Sleeve Length
sleeve.description: Measure from the center back neck to the end of the sleeve.

tip1.title: Accurate Measurements
tip1.description: For the best fit, have someone else take your measurements while you stand relaxed.

tip2.title: Between Sizes?
tip2.description: If you're between sizes, we recommend choosing the larger size for a comfortable fit.

tip3.title: Need Help?
tip3.description: Contact our customer service team if you have any questions about sizing.

cta.title: Ready to take your trading to the next level?
cta.subtitle: Join our VIP mentorship and get exclusive access to advanced strategies

legal.title: Compliance Policy & Terms of Service
legal.subtitle: Discover how we ensure a safe and transparent environment for your trading experience

terms.toolsDescription: DayTradeDAK is your ally in the world of trading, offering a wide range of educational tools designed to improve your skills. Our market analysis provides you with accurate and up-to-date information, while our trading strategies help you make informed decisions. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, our resources are designed to enhance your success in the stock market.

orderProcessing.title: Order Processing
orderProcessing.subtitle: Immediate Platform Access
orderProcessing.description: Once you complete your payment, you'll receive instant access to our platform. There are no delays: you can start exploring our tools and resources immediately. Additionally, you'll receive an email confirmation to ensure everything is in order. Enjoy 24/7 access to our services while your subscription is active.

pricing.title: Pricing in USD
pricing.subtitle: Pricing Information
pricing.description: All prices for our services are expressed in US dollars (USD), ensuring clarity and transparency in every transaction. This approach allows our users to easily understand associated costs without surprises or additional conversions. By using the US dollar as our reference currency, we ensure a consistent and uncomplicated user experience.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: At LIVE ANALYSIS, we value flexibility and customer satisfaction. That's why we offer our users the ability to cancel their subscription at any time through their account settings. This process is simple and designed for users to maintain full control over their subscriptions.
cancellation.benefit: Access continues until end of billing period

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.subtitle: Refunds and Payments
refunds.description: Due to the digital and immediate nature of our services, we do not offer refunds once payment has been processed. This policy is designed to maintain the integrity of our services and ensure all users have equitable access to our resources.

risk.title: Trading Risk Disclaimer
risk.description: Trading financial instruments carries high risk and is not suitable for all investors. You may lose part or all of your investment. Past performance does not guarantee future results. DayTradeDAK is not responsible for financial losses resulting from information or strategies presented on the platform.

noAdvice.title: No Financial Advice
noAdvice.description: DayTradeDAK is an educational platform and market analysis service. We are not registered financial advisors and do not provide financial, legal, or investment advice. All strategies and analyses presented on the platform are for educational purposes only.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At DayTradeDAK, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and share your information when you use our platform and services.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.subtitle: Your data is used for:
dataUsage.improvement: Analyzing usage to enhance user experience

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Our security protocols are regularly updated to ensure maximum protection.

access.title: Access
access.description: Request a copy of your personal data

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: Transfer your data to another service
